com.cognifide.qa.bb.logging

Interface ReportEntryLogger

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReportEntryLoggerImpl

    public interface ReportEntryLogger
    The ReportEntryLogger interface provides all basic methods for manually creating report log entries.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void endSubreport(String subreport)
      End a subreport section.
      void error(String message)
      Add error message to the log.
      void error(String message, Object... parameters)
      Format an error message using String.format and passed parameters, then add it to the log.
      void error(String message, Throwable exception)
      Add error message and stacktrace.
      void event(String action, String param, long duration)
      Method to manually add an event entry.
      void info(String message)
      Add an information message to the log.
      void info(String message, Object... parameters)
      Format a message using String.format and passed parameters, then add it to the log.
      void screenshot()
      Take and attach a screenshot to the report.
      void screenshot(String message)
      Take and attach a screenshot with additional message to the report.
      void startSubreport(String subreport)
      Start a subreport section.

    • Method Detail

      • info

        void info(String message)
        Add an information message to the log.
        Parameters:
        message - info description

      • info

        void info(String message,
          Object... parameters)
        Format a message using String.format and passed parameters, then add it to the log.
        Parameters:
        message - info description pattern (see String.format(String, Object...))
        parameters - parameters

      • error

        void error(String message)
        Add error message to the log.
        Parameters:
        message - error description

      • error

        void error(String message,
           Object... parameters)
        Format an error message using String.format and passed parameters, then add it to the log.
        Parameters:
        message - error description pattern (see String.format(String, Object...))
        parameters - parameters

      • error

        void error(String message,
           Throwable exception)
        Add error message and stacktrace.
        Parameters:
        message - error description
        exception - original exception

      • screenshot

        void screenshot()
        Take and attach a screenshot to the report.

      • screenshot

        void screenshot(String message)
        Take and attach a screenshot with additional message to the report.
        Parameters:
        message - screenshot entry message

      • event

        void event(String action,
           String param,
           long duration)
        Method to manually add an event entry. In most cases this method is called only by webDriverListener.
        Parameters:
        action - name of an event
        param - event parameter
        duration - how long the event took (in milliseconds)

      • startSubreport

        void startSubreport(String subreport)
        Start a subreport section.
        Parameters:
        subreport - name of subreport section.

      • endSubreport

        void endSubreport(String subreport)
        End a subreport section.
        Parameters:
        subreport - name of subreport section.
